text: Raosaheb Ramrao Patil, better known as R. R. Patil () (16 August 1957 - 16 February 2015), was an Indian politician from the state of Maharashtra. He was a leader of the Nationalist Congress Party. He became Home Minister of Maharashtra. He was also the former Deputy Chief Minister of Maharashtra. He won assembly election from Tasgaon Constituency. Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Maharashtra
title: R. R. Patil
